mapper.select: select customer_id, customer_name, cust_tel, cust_addr, cust_mail from customer
select item_code, item_name from itemlist where item_type = '완제품'
select c.customer_id, c.customer_name, o.ord_id, o.ord_name from customer c join orders o on c.customer_id = o.customer_id where customer_name = #{oCode}
select c.customer_id, c.customer_name, o.ord_id, o.ord_name from customer c join orders o on c.customer_id = o.customer_id where ord_status = '접수완료'

select c.customer_name, c.cust_addr, c.cust_mail, c.cust_tel, o.ord_name, e.emp_name from customer c join orders o on( c.customer_id = o.customer_id) join emp e on( o.emp_no = e.emp_no) where o.ord_id = #{ordId} and c.customer_id = #{customerId}
